captions.text:
>>HI WELCOME TO MCDOOGAL'S.
CAN I TAKE YOUR ORDER?

>>YEAH, I'LL HAVE A MCDOOBAL WITH CHEESE
AND A LARGE COKE.

>>OKAY, THAT'LL BE 3.85, GOT A TEN.
HERE YOU GO.

>>WHOA.
THAT GUY GAVE ME WAY TOO MUCH CHANGE.

[CHUCKLE] SWEET!
>>POOF.

>>UH, WHO ARE YOU?
>>I'M YOUR SHOULDER ANGEL JAMES.

NOW IF YOU JUST TAKE A KNEE HERE.
>>LIKE-- >>YEP.

>>OKAY.
>>THERE YOU GO.

>>EXCUSE ME.
THERE WE GO.
>>THAT WAS A LOT EASIER.

>>YEAH. RIGHT?
NOW JAMES, YOU NEED TO RETURN THAT MONEY.

ISN'T YOUR INTEGRITY WORTH MORE
THAN A FEW EXTRA DOLLARS?

>>OH MAN.
I DROPPED A BURGER.

CAN I STILL SERVE IT?
>>[LAUGHTER] >>POOF.

>>OH NO.
>>OH YES JASON.

I'M YOUR SHOULDER DEVIL.
HERE ALLOW ME TO JUST-- UH, JASON.

NOBODY SAW WHAT YOU DID.
YOU'RE SAFE.

PUT THE MCDOOBAL ON THE TRAY AND
PRETEND LIKE IT NEVER HAPPENED.

>>ALL RIGHT, I'LL DO IT.
>>WHAT?

>>ALL RIGHT, I'LL DO IT.
>>WHAT?

>>I KNEW THIS DAY WOULD COME.
>>HOLD ON JAMES.

SOMEONE ELSE NEEDS MY HELP.
>>HOLD ON JASON, SOMEONE ELSE

NEEDS MY EVILNESS.
EXCUSE ME.

PARDON.
MUST SAY I'M SURPRISED TO SEE YOU.

WHERE'S THE USUAL GUY?
>>IT'S HIS DAY OFF.

>>GOOD, I NEVER LIKED HIM ANYWAY.
GOING TO NEED THAT ARM BACK.

THERE IT IS.
>>NOW JASON, JASON, JASON.

YOU SHOULDN'T SERVE THIS FOOD.
>>BUT I ONLY DROPPED IT FOR A SECOND.

>>WHAT?
I DON'T CARE THAT YOU DROPPED IT,

I'M JUST SAYING YOU SHOULDN'T SERVE
IT AS FOOD.

IT'S INCREDIBLE UNHEALTHY.
>>JAMES, JUST TAKE THE MONEY AND GO.

IT'S NOT YOUR FAULT MR. INCOMPETENT
THERE GAVE YOU THE WRONG CHANGE.

>>HEY!
>>SORRY, I DIDN'T REALIZE YOU COULD

HEAR ME.
>>ALL RIGHT.

>>OKAY.
>>TOGETHER: I'LL DO IT.

>>TOGETHER: GOOD.
WAIT, WHAT?

>>UH, YOU'RE THE WORST!
UH, COMING BACK JASON.

OH, I HATE HER SO MUCH.
OKAY JASON.

ALL RIGHT.
SOMETHING JUST HAPPENED.

JASON IF YOU COULD JUST LIFT ME.
OH.

OH, MY GIRTH IS OVERHEATING, WHAT
DO WE HAVE IN THE

WAY OF COLA PRODUCTS.
OH.

CAFFEINE FREE, UTAH.
BRING ME BACK.

LISTEN BLONDIE.
HOW ABOUT I KEEP MR. INCOMPETENT AND YOU

CAN KEEP THE GUY WITH STRANGE BODY ODOR.
>>HEY!

>>SORRY, I FORGOT YOU WERE RIGHT HERE.
>>ALL RIGHT, LISTEN.

YOU GAVE ME TOO MUCH CHANGE.
HERE'S YOUR BURGER.

IT DROPPED ON THE GROUND, BUT TO
BE HONEST IT'S PROBABLY

NOT THE WORST THING THAT BEEF
PATTY'S BEEN THROUGH.

>>HONESTY PREVAILS!
>>YOU MAY HAVE WON THE BATTLE BLONDIE,

BUT THE WAR IS FAR FROM-- IS THAT A DOLLAR
MENU?
OH YES.

comments.author: Coral Roper

comments.text:
My stress management professor was explaining about the ego, super ego, and 
the id and this video popped into my head after she explained it to our 
class. Afterwards I emailed her this vid along with a few other  
#shoulderangel  ones and then today in class she showed this video to recap 
what we had just learned! I was so excited and the class was laughing like 
crazy. And then they guy next to me was like this is hilarious I wonder 
where she found this video? and I said she didn't I sent it to her. and he 
was like wow you have good taste in comedy. What's this show called and I 
said  #studioc  and it's on the #byu  channel. And now some of the class 
want to watch more studio c videos. who would of thought that #studioc 
 could be so educational :P best show Ever!﻿
